name: Sublunker
description:
Pilot a submarine and get lost in an underwater cave.

Use your sonar and spotlight to scout out ahead, but beware, some animals might not appreciate being disturbed.

Try and find all 4 coral gardens hidden in the cave below

W - Throttle up

S - Throttle down

A - Turn left

D - Turn right

R - Increase buoyancy

F - Decrease buoyancy

E - Toggle spotlight

Space - Ping Sonar

Up / Scroll Up - Zoom in

Down / Scroll Down - Zoom Out
